txt.en: After escaping the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu, some of the surviving Ghâshfra found their way to Mount Gundabad where their mastery of flame has established them as powerful allies of Gorgar the Ruthless.
Mission: The Last Embers of Nûrz Ghâshu

'Well done, [placeholder]! I fear that is not the last of these... Ghâshfra, but there will be time enough to track the rest of them down in days to come. Let us return and report your success to Hórin!'
Your mission is to defeat Draupush, one of the Ghâshfra in service to Gorgar the Ruthless.
